casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Billy Ray ARTIS 316P98-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Billy Ray Artis, for Artis, Billy Ray. Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of September 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Rehearing:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."
